name: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Amane Gakuen
name_original: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Amane Gakuen
description: Kiniro no Corda 3: Another Sky feat. Amane Gakuen (金色のコルダ３ AnotherSky feat.天音学園) is a Visual Novel video game published by Koei Tecmo Games released on September 25th, 2014 for the PlayStation Portable.
